nodes.documentation:
@dev Exchange SPOS tokens on bonus tokens. This action burns 'amount' of SPOS and transfers bonus tokens to a caller.
@param _amount Amount of SPOS tokens to exchange
nodes.name: exchangeSposTokensOnBonusTokens
executeSubscription

params._commission: Commission on incoming payments that should form bonus tokens pool; [0..10000); 1 unit == 0.01%
params._initialRatio: SimplePOS creator sets up the initial ratio of bonus tokens pool to the SimplePOSToken supply
params._sposTokenName: SimplePOSToken name; SimplePOSToken controls bonus tokens pool
params._sposTokenSymbol: SimplePOSToken symbol; SimplePOSToken controls bonus tokens pool
params.sender: Ownership will be assigned to this address. Required for deployments via factory contract

exchangeSposTokensOnBonusTokens(uint256).details: Exchange SPOS tokens on bonus tokens. This action burns 'amount' of SPOS and transfers bonus tokens to a caller.

params._amount: Amount of SPOS tokens to exchange

executeSubscription(address,uint256,uint.details: Execute subscription for a user. This will accept payment in bonus tokens (signed by a user). SPOS tokens will be minted accordingly.

params._periodSeconds: the period in seconds between payments
params._tokenAmount: amount of SimplePOS exchange tokens payed for the subscription
